data.oai_dc:dc: Colour contrasts WA-QLD from 4 pop data

Colour contrasts values for individuals of the red and yellow form, as calculated in the 'script BJLS colour contrasts.R'. These data are used in the script 'script BJLS correlations carot plasma skin colour.R'.
carotenoids|colour production|geographic gradient|honest signalling|proximate mechanism|pteridines|Frillneck lizard
